definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: The sexton therefore took him into his house, and he had to ring the church bell.
sentences.chinese: 於是司事就將老二帶走了，讓他在教堂敲鐘。

sentences.english: The police apprehended her and took her away.
sentences.chinese: 警察還是抓住了她，把她帶走了。

sentences.english: Where is the dyna-drill which you repaired?
sentences.chinese: 這就是他忘記帶走的那本鑽井手冊。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a chariot of fire appeared from heaven and took Elijah away.
sentences.chinese: 突然，天降一團火把以利亞帶走了。

sentences.english: Every time, the key managers, they have takeaways.
sentences.chinese: 每一次，重要的管理者會有帶走的任務。

sentences.english: Going into the tana away, west mother forbade it, get rid of him.
sentences.chinese: 塔納要闖進去帶走帕萊，西瓦母親不允，趕走了他。

sentences.english: You're takin' away everything, and I can't do without.
sentences.chinese: 你帶走了一切，但我不能沒有他們。
他大聲喊着，“別把這孩子帶走。

sentences.english: A cat has nine lives. But the AZRAEL still take it away.
sentences.chinese: 貓有九條命，但它仍然會被死神帶走。

sentences.english: I would like to know that those who fled south, the birds who actually took the yearning.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，那些倉皇南飛的鳥羣究竟帶走了誰的思念。

sentences.english: He took with him several of his subordinates, and amongst them Dantès' jailer.
sentences.chinese: 他帶走了幾個下屬，看管唐太斯的獄卒也在其中。

sentences.english: The march composing in small on her home, suddenly being taken away by guards locked up in a prison.
sentences.chinese: 賽琦雅正在小玉兒家，突然被侍衛帶走關進了大牢。

sentences.english: You can't let the FBI take Arete away from us.
sentences.chinese: 你不能讓FBI從我們手裏帶走阿雷特。

sentences.english: The militiaman walked the spy off.
sentences.chinese: 民兵把那個特務帶走了。

sentences.english: There was utter pandemonium outside the university building as ambulances carted away the injured.
sentences.chinese: 隨着救護車帶走受傷的人，大學主樓外絕對亂成一團。

sentences.english: The exploiter would carry away his prophesy of harvest.
sentences.chinese: 拓荒者將帶走收穫的預言。

definition: to let off/to let slip by/to let sb get away with sth
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to press charges/to file a complaint
to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart
to return to one's home country
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
